summary: A fun, simple app to generate a random fake startup to help you build your next project.
A 3-way temperature converter. I recently refactored this project to take advantage of the useReducer hook, which made managing the state much easier

A simple string formatting app which allows you to convert text into a few different helpful formats. This project was also recently refactored to utilize the useReducer hook for better state management.
Is this cheating? This was my first medium sized project built using React & SCSS, and I'm darn proud of it!

Pokédux is a massive overhaul of a project I previously built. It utilizes Redux for state management, Axios for fetching data, React Router DOM for dynamic routing, and more. Definitely my most complex project to date!
A client survey for a fictional wealth management company. I built this project to learn the basics of Framer Motion, as well as using React Modal, and various React form inputs.
